name: com.hsoar.serial-unity-package
description: A barebones package designed to interface arduino based devices with unity.

samples.description: A scene containing a Serial Manager, an LED changing script that enables an LED pressing W and disables with S. As well as corrosponding Arduino .INO and PlatformIO .cpp files.
Contains a sample Serial Manager prefab to use in your scenes.
A scene containing a Serial Manager, a XY Controller script that uses two potentiometers to control a cube on screen. As well as the corrosponding Arduino .INO and .CPP files.
A scene containing a Serial Manager, and a JSONHandler object that sends a mapped mouse position to an arduino and awaits a response. As well as corrosponding Arduino .INO and PlatformIO .cpp files.
